get.summary: Retrieves the Charge details of an account
get.description: Retrieves the Charge details of an account

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

chargeDate.description: The date on which the charge will be debited to the charge account

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

deferDate.description: Date that the payment has been deferred to

billId.description: Indicates the bill reference or Id

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

interestRate.description: Identifies the bid rate of the related currency for the defined time period

limitCurrency.description: Currency in which the credit limit is granted

limitType.description: Defines the limit type for the trade

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

availableOrExcessAmount.description: Indicates the available amount defined in the Limit Condition

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

paymentTypes.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

paymentTypeName.description: Indicates Payment type set to an account

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

propertyName.description: Indicates the Id of the product property

financialArrangement.description: Indicates the financial arrangement which was linked to the Agent.

agentRole.description: The role of the 3rd party, select from standard list

subscriptionRef.description: Indicates the alert subscription reference Id generated for the activity.

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

subscriptionRef.description: Indicates the alert subscription reference Id generated for the activity.

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

deferDate.description: Date that the payment has been deferred to

totalDue.description: This amount represents the total due amount for that period.

taxAmount.description: Total amount of taxes applicable on all commission or charges calculated for the transaction/payment.

totalPayment.description: This amount represents the total payment that has happened for the period

outstandingAmount.description: Identifies the total outstanding amount for the corresponding Liability number and Limit reference.

additionalDetail.description: Additional details provided to add context. Closure notes for closed accounts, positing restriction details for restricted accounts & joint holder notes or account title for active accounts

availableLimit.description: The portion of an allocated credit limit that is available for the nominated customer

termAmount.description: The monetary amount applied to the account

term.description: Indicates the term for which the contract is booked

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

action.description: Refers to view or cancel options.

date.description: Indicates the date on which activity was performed

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

coolingDate.description: Indicates the end of cooling period after which account will be cancelled if not funded.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

nextPaymentDate.description: Indicates next payment date for the contract

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

negativeInterestAmount.description: Indicates the negative amount of a interest property
